mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran_history (id, stage, money, expectedDate, createTime, createBy, tranId) VALUES ( #{id}, #{stage}, #{money}, #{expectedDate}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{tranId} )
mapper.select: select tth.id, tth.stage, tth.money, tth.expectedDate, tth.createTime, tu.name as createBy, tth.tranId from tbl_tran_history tth inner join tbl_user tu on tth.createBy = tu.id where tth.tranId = #{tranId}
